compress.description: Compresses the context by replacing it with a summary.
compress.already_compressing: Already compressing, wait for previous request to complete

fallback_improved.description: toggle between improved fallback strategy (7 attempts, 2s delays, reset to Pro) and original Google behavior (2 attempts, exponential backoff)
fallback_improved.improved_description: Improved strategy: 7 attempts with 2s delays, reset to Pro on each message
fallback_improved.original_description: Original strategy: 2 attempts with exponential backoff, stay on Flash once switched

model_switch.description: switch between Gemini Pro and Flash models

stay_pro.description: toggle whether to stay on Pro model (disable/enable fallback to Flash)
stay_pro.disabled: Fallback disabled - will stay on Gemini Pro even if rate limited
stay_pro.enabled: Fallback enabled - will switch to Flash if Pro is rate limited

restore.description: restore a tool call. This will reset the conversation and file history to the state it was in when the tool call was suggested
restore.no_directory: Could not determine the .gemini directory path.
restore.project_restored: Restored project to the state before the tool call.
restore.read_error: Could not read restorable tool calls. This is the error: {error}

phrases: Checking for syntax errors in the universe...
Just a sec, I'm debugging reality...
Crafting a response worthy of your patience...
Defragmenting memories... both RAM and personal...
Running sudo make me a sandwich...
Swapping bits... don't tell the bytes...
Pushing to production (and hoping for the best)...
Greasin' the cogs of the machine...
Aligning the stars for optimal response...
Just a moment, I'm in the zone...
Preparing to dazzle you with brilliance...
Just a tick, I'm polishing my wit...
Hold tight, I'm crafting a masterpiece...
Just a jiffy, I'm debugging the universe...
Just a moment, I'm aligning the pixels...
Just a sec, I'm optimizing the humor...
Just a moment, I'm tuning the algorithms...
I'm Giving Her all she's got Captain!
The truth is in here... somewhere...
Looking for the princess in another castle...
Finishing the Kessel Run in less than 12 parsecs...
The cake is not a lie, it's just still loading...
Fiddling with the character creation screen...
Just a moment, I'm finding the right meme...
Finding a suitable loading screen pun...
Distracting you with this witty phrase...
Our hamsters are working as fast as they can...
Giving Cloudy a pat on the head...
Never gonna give you up, never gonna let you down...
I'm going the distance, I'm going for speed...
Is this the real life? Is this just fantasy?...
I've got a good feeling about this...
Doing research on the latest memes...
Figuring out how to make this more witty...
What do you call a fish with no eyes? A fsh...
Why did the computer go to therapy? It had too many bytes...
Why don't programmers like nature? It has too many bugs...
Why do programmers prefer dark mode? Because light attracts bugs...
Why did the developer go broke? Because he used up all his cache...
What can you do with a broken pencil? Nothing, it's pointless...
Searching for the correct USB orientation...
Ensuring the magic smoke stays inside the wires...
Rewriting in Rust for no particular reason...
That's not a bug, it's an undocumented feature...
I'll be back... with an answer.
My other process is a TARDIS...
Just remembered where I put my keys...
I've seen things you people wouldn't believe... like a user who reads loading messages.
What's a computer's favorite snack? Microchips.
Why do Java developers wear glasses? Because they don't C#.
Looking for an adult superviso... I mean, processing.
Buffering... because even AIs need a moment.
Entangling quantum particles for a faster response...
Polishing the chrome... on the algorithms.
Are you not entertained? (Working on it!)
Summoning the code gremlins... to help, of course.
Just waiting for the dial-up tone to finish...
My other loading screen is even funnier.
Pretty sure there's a cat walking on the keyboard somewhere...
It's not a bug, it's a feature... of this loading screen.
Have you tried turning it off and on again? (The loading screen, not me.)

privacy.no_current_tier: User does not have a current tier
privacy.gemini_code_assist_notice_title: Gemini Code Assist for Individuals Privacy Notice
privacy.notice_intro: This notice and our Privacy Policy {ref} describe how Gemini Code Assist handles your data. Please read them carefully.
privacy.data_collection_description: When you use Gemini Code Assist for individuals with Gemini CLI, Google collects your prompts, related code, generated output, code edits, related feature usage information, and your feedback to provide, improve, and develop Google products and services and machine learning technologies.
privacy.human_review_description: To help with quality and improve our products (such as generative machine-learning models), human reviewers may read, annotate, and process the data collected above. We take steps to protect your privacy as part of this process. This includes disconnecting the data from your Google Account before reviewers see or annotate it, and storing those disconnected copies for up to 18 months. Please don't submit confidential information or any data you wouldn't want a reviewer to see or Google to use to improve our products, services and machine-learning technologies.
privacy.allow_data_usage_question: Allow Google to use this data to develop and improve our products?
privacy.press_enter_choose_exit: Press Enter to choose an option and exit.
privacy.gemini_api_terms_text: By using the Gemini API {ref1}, Google AI Studio {ref2}, and the other Google developer services that reference these terms (collectively, the "APIs" or "Services"), you are agreeing to Google APIs Terms of Service (the "API Terms") {ref3}, and the Gemini API Additional Terms of Service (the "Additional Terms") {ref4}.
privacy.vertex_ai_service_terms_text: Service Specific Terms {ref1} are incorporated into the agreement under which Google has agreed to provide Google Cloud Platform {ref2} to Customer (the "Agreement"). If the Agreement authorizes the resale or supply of Google Cloud Platform under a Google Cloud partner or reseller program, then except for in the section entitled "Partner-Specific Terms", all references to Customer in the Service Specific Terms mean Partner or Reseller (as applicable), and all references to Customer Data in the Service Specific Terms mean Partner Data. Capitalized terms used but not defined in the Service Specific Terms have the meaning given to them in the Agreement.
